workshop.controllers

Class ExceptionHandlerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.ExceptionHandlerController

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class ExceptionHandlerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Returns MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_UTF8 with a JsonObject as: {"errorMessage":"Localized exception message text."}

      • validationFailure

        @ExceptionHandler(value={InvalidMethodArgumentsException.class,org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException.class})
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> validationFailure(InvalidMethodArgumentsException ex)
        Produces 422 HttpStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY with Json object as "fieldName : fieldErrorDescription"
        Parameters:
        ex - IllegalMethodArgumentException or MethodArgumentNotValidException
        Returns:
        Json object with fully described field errors as: "fieldName : fieldErrorDescription"

      • persistenceFailed

        @ExceptionHandler(value=WorkshopException.class)
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> persistenceFailed(WorkshopException wx,
                                                                                                                                                     java.util.Locale locale)
        1) First if WorkshopException.getLocalizedMessage() != null it will be used to be shown to the end Users. 2) Second if WorkshopException.getMessageSourceKey() != null the messageSource will be obtained by this key to be shown to the end Users according their Locales. 3) Last, WorkshopException.getMessage will be used for such a purpose.
        Parameters:
        wx - WorkshopException.class instance.
        Returns:
        Json "errorMessage"
